title: Unlocking Affiliate Power: The Math Behind Tokenized Commissions and Economic Growth 📈
description: This paper dives deep into the mathematical framework of TokenAffiliates, revealing how a 10% commission sparks viral marketing in the crypto world 💰. It explores automated payouts on Solana, ensuring affiliates get their fair share instantly upon investments ⚡. The model highlights how these incentives boost token demand and price appreciation through bonding curves 📊. Ultimately, it sets the stage for a decentralized ecosystem where smart affiliates can thrive and contribute to economic expansion 🌍.
